topic.title: Projects
topic.p: Projects let you combine Qodana reports within an organization.

Each project is identified by a unique project token. You can generate the project token after creating the project, and use it in your CI/CD pipelines for uploading %product% reports to Qodana Cloud.

chapter.title: Create a project
chapter.p: If you would like to overview reports using your private organization, on the organization page click the Create first project button.

img.alt: Creating a new project in a private organization

chapter.p: In case you would like to review %product% reports apart from your private organization, you need to navigate to the team you wish to create a project under. On the team page, click the Create project button.

img.alt: Creating a new project in an organization

chapter.p: Now, you can see the project.

chapter.title: Manage a project
chapter.p: After the project was created, you can generate a project token to uniquely identify the project in your CI/CD pipelines. To do this, click Generate token. To learn more about uploading reports to Qodana Cloud, see the section.
Once the token is generated, you can regenerate it, rename the project, or delete the project.
